statements: SELECT * FROM student_profiles ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, age FROM student_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, major FROM student_profiles WHERE age > 20 AND gpa >= 3.5 ORDER BY gpa DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_profiles WHERE major = 'Computer Science' AND age <= 25;
SELECT id, name, age, gpa FROM student_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' AND major LIKE '%Engineering%' ORDER BY age ASC, gpa DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_profiles WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, name, major FROM student_profiles WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT name, age, gpa FROM student_profiles WHERE major='Computer Science' AND gpa > 3.5
SELECT * FROM student_profiles WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT id, name, age, gender, major FROM student_profiles WHERE gpa < 2.5
SELECT id, name, age, address FROM student_profiles;
SELECT * FROM student_profiles ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, address FROM student_profiles WHERE age > 20;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE preference_name = 'Theme';
SELECT * FROM student_profiles WHERE age > 18;
SELECT name, age FROM student_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_profiles WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, address FROM student_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM student_profiles;
SELECT student_id, name, age FROM student_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, gender FROM student_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT student_id, name, GPA FROM student_profiles WHERE GPA > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM student_profiles WHERE age >= 20 AND age <= 25 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age, GPA FROM student_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, gender, favorite_subject FROM student_profiles WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_preferences WHERE game_category = 'Puzzle' AND preferred_difficulty = 'Hard';
SELECT student_id, strategy_name FROM student_profiles INNER JOIN gamification_strategies ON student_profiles.student_id = gamification_strategies.strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM StudentProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM StudentProfiles WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT student_id, favorite_subject FROM StudentPreferences ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GamificationStrategies WHERE strategy_type='Engagement';
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM ContentPreferences WHERE content_category='Math';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM StudentProfiles WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM StudentProfiles INNER JOIN StudentPreferences ON StudentProfiles.student_id = StudentPreferences.student_id;
SELECT student_id, favorite_subject, favorite_game FROM StudentPreferences WHERE preferred_difficulty='Easy';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM GamificationStrategies WHERE strategy_type='Competition';
SELECT content_type, content_category FROM ContentPreferences WHERE content_difficulty='Intermediate';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, age, city FROM students WHERE grade_level = '10th';
SELECT course_name, instructor, department FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, current_progress FROM students s INNER JOIN progress_tracker pt ON s.student_id = pt.student_id;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards ORDER BY points_required DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age DESC, student_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, city, age FROM students WHERE grade_level = '10' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM courses WHERE instructor LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT student_name, course_name, current_progress FROM students JOIN progress_tracker ON students.student_id = progress_tracker.student_id WHERE progress_tracker.current_progress >= 50.00;
SELECT student_name, reward_name, points_required FROM students JOIN rewards ON students.age >= 16 AND students.age <= 18 AND students.student_id % 2 = 0;
